pages.text: $(li)Spectre are ethereal peaceful creatures that can be found over the End.$(br)$(li)They can phase throught blocks and only take magic damage.$(br)$(li)Spectres may be attracted holding a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/soul_vulture)Soul Heart$(/l).

$(li)You can attach a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/lead)Lead$(/l) to a Spectre to travel with it.$(br)$(li)They are fast than the $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/endergrade)Endergrades$(/l) but the player cannot control where the Spectre travels to.$(br)$(li)Sneaking or interacting with the $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/lead)Lead$(/l) will make to you let go of it.
